title: Dealership Tour & Introduction
objective: Use a short, purposeful dealership tour to increase comfort, credibility, and trust—introducing key people and touchpoints that reinforce how we support the guest before, during, and after the sale.
position_in_journey: Decision Point → Dealership Tour → Numbers / Commitment
learning_outcomes: Explain why we do the tour and when to do it (timing).
Deliver a 3–6 minute tour that feels helpful, not corny.
Introduce the right people with a trust-first purpose.
Use the tour to reduce anxiety and increase confidence before numbers.
Create one ‘proof of support’ moment (service + ownership).
Transition smoothly from tour to the next step.
